name: altopeq2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)))

stmt.origin: mpan(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)))

|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c2, c0), caltop(c2, c1)))

comment: Equality for alternate ordered pairs. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 22-Mar-2012.)
